title: [安全]xAuth注册登陆插件2.0.20最新版完全汉化版--玩家登陆注册[1.3.1-R2.0]
author: kuboy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kuboy 于 2012-8-24 22:46 编辑 

xAuth v2.0.20
Authentication plugin for bukkit powered servers
Craftbukkit 1.3.1R2.0

插件介绍：AboutxAuth was initially designed to protect a server and its players while running in offline-mode. As the plugin enhanced over the time the main purpose changed. Lets say you run a community page. With xAuth players can authenticate against their forum accounts or against a web driven account management. It is also possible to get the creditionals from a foreign database.
关于译文:xAuth 最初设计目的被为了让服务器和玩家们在脱机模式下运行的服务器安全游戏。随着时间的推移增强的插件作为主要目的已更改。比如说当你运营这一个社交网页时。XAuth 与玩家论坛或者其他网站进行管理。也可以从外部数据库获得积分。
